thread.section_title: The Roosevelt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Top Hotel Close to Everything
thread.title_full: Top Hotel Close to Everything - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: alices902
title: Top Hotel Close to Everything
text: Hotel was clean and roomy with a beautiful lobby and open spaces. The staff were friendly. The one small issue I had being charged for a coffee that I had already paid cash for was resolved. They provided an internet access that allowed the teens to have multiple devices connected. That was a life saver. Starbucks coffee in lobby, too! The window in our room was stuck in a slightly open position so the noise was louder than it had to be and we set the heat higher than it had to be, but overall great place to stay.
